name: Polyrunner
description:
Polyrunner is a rhythm based action puzzle game. You play as the polyrunner through a tunnel of panels and walls. 

Gameplay:

You move forward automatically.

Move left and right across 5 lanes using "a" and "d" on the keyboard.

You can rotate the oncoming colored level piece using "q" and "r". 

You change polyrunner's head color using the arrow keys "left, up, right for R,G,B" 

When you change a color you can go through the same colored wall. 

Red colored walls will destroy the player if collided with regardless of color change. 

have to close the game and restart the level currently. 

You can also play with a controller.
